solution_line_template: Working out the difference between the amount of wood available at the start and the end of the day shows that {bundles_start_day} bundles - {bundles_end_day} bundles = <<{bundles_start_day}-{bundles_end_day}={bundles_burned_total}>>{bundles_burned_total} bundles of wood have been burned throughout the day.

Subtracting the wood burned in the morning from this shows that {bundles_burned_total} bundles - {bundles_burned_morning} bundles = <<{bundles_burned_total}-{bundles_burned_morning}={bundles_burned_afternoon}>>{bundles_burned_afternoon} bundles of wood were burned in the afternoon.
